name: Balanced Diets
description:
“Balanced Diets” is an accelerometer-based experimental Android game in which players assume the role of a waiter delivering trays of food to hungry customers in a busy restaurant. The player must tilt their mobile device to control the orientation of an in-game tray and balance the various food items until they have been successfully delivered.

Credits

Kevin McEnroe - Project Manager, Programmer, Unity Developer

Charlie Devlin - 3D Modeller, 2D Artist, Sound Designer

Stephen Kellet Murray - 2D Artist
